1100011101001010 0000100111001110 0 -> sum: 1101000100011000, cout: 0

0101100010001000 1000001001100011 0 -> sum: 1101101011101011, cout: 0
1111000000110010 0000000011101000 1 -> sum: 1111000100011011, cout: 0
0001001111000110 0010110111000011 1 -> sum: 0100000110001010, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
